text: Bei dou yin ren [youmu de alabo ren] shuo:“Women xinyangle.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen hai meiyou zhenzheng xinyang, nimen zhishi shuo:“Women guishun [yisilan jiao]le”, yin wei xinyang hai meiyou zhenzheng jinru nimen de xinzhong. Jiaru nimen fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], name, ta bu hui jianshao nimen de renhe shangong. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.”
